languages.text: {n}Драйвстем бросает на вас взгляд, в котором вам чудится нечто... осуждающее? Насмешливое? Порицающее? Так ли это, или {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}неспокойная совесть{/d}, взбудораженная цепким взглядом, играет с вами шутки, припоминая давнишний {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}проступок{/d}?{/n}

{n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Драйвстем бросает на вас взгляд, в котором вам чудится нечто... осуждающее? Насмешливое? Порицающее? Так ли это, или {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}неспокойная совесть{/d}, взбудораженная цепким взглядом, играет с вами шутки, припоминая давнишний {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}проступок{/d}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your guilty conscience playing tricks on you, stirring up the memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

{n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your guilty conscience playing tricks on you, stirring up the memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

{n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your guilty conscience playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

{n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your guilty conscience playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

{n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your guilty conscience playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

languages.text: {n}德莱夫斯塔的目光中有某些东西让你感到不安。这是某种责备的暗示吗？还是嘲笑？抑或是某种谴责？你不确定总督真的有这样的打算，还是只是你自己的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}罪恶感{/d}在折磨你。在总督锐利的目光之下，你过去的回忆涌上了心头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}德莱夫斯塔的目光中有某些东西让你感到不安。这是某种责备的暗示吗？还是嘲笑？抑或是某种谴责？你不确定总督真的有这样的打算，还是只是你自己的罪恶感在折磨你。在总督锐利的目光之下，你过去的回忆涌上了心头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}In Drivestems Blick liegt etwas, was dich zutiefst beunruhigt. Ist es ein Anflug von Tadel? Spott? Verurteilung? Du bist unsicher, ob es überhaupt wirklich existiert, oder ob dein {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}schlechtes Gewissen{/d} dir nur einen Streich spielt und unter dem scharfen Blick des Gouverneurs Erinnerungen an deine Vergangenheit hochholt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In Drivestems Blick liegt etwas, was dich zutiefst beunruhigt. Ist es ein Anflug von Tadel? Spott? Verurteilung? Du bist unsicher, ob es überhaupt wirklich existiert, oder ob dein schlechtes Gewissen dir nur einen Streich spielt und unter dem scharfen Blick des Gouverneurs Erinnerungen an deine Vergangenheit hochholt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il y a quelque chose de troublant dans le regard de Drivestem. Serait-ce un soupçon de reproche ? De moquerie ? De condamnation ? Ou serait-ce votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}mauvaise conscience{/d} qui, intimidée par le regard perçant du gouverneur, vous joue des tours en faisant ressurgir dans votre esprit des souvenirs de votre passé ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il y a quelque chose de troublant dans le regard de Drivestem. Serait-ce un soupçon de reproche ? De moquerie ? De condamnation ? Ou serait-ce votre mauvaise conscience qui, intimidée par le regard perçant du gouverneur, vous joue des tours en faisant ressurgir dans votre esprit des souvenirs de votre passé ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hay algo perturbador en la mirada de Drivestem. ¿Es un toque de reproche? ¿De burla? ¿De condena? No sabes si es algo real o si es solo tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}conciencia culpable{/d} jugándote una mala pasada y despertando recuerdos de tu pasado bajo la penetrante mirada del gobernador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hay algo perturbador en la mirada de Drivestem. ¿Es un toque de reproche? ¿De burla? ¿De condena? No sabes si es algo real o si es solo tu conciencia culpable jugándote una mala pasada y despertando recuerdos de tu pasado bajo la penetrante mirada del gobernador.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ドライブステムの視線には何か気になるものがある。侮辱？嘲り？非難？あなたはそれが実際そうなのか、それとも単に{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}良心の呵責{/d}に苛まれ、総督の鋭い視線に過去の記憶を掻き立てられただけなのか、確信が持てない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステムの視線には何か気になるものがある。侮辱？嘲り？非難？あなたはそれが実際そうなのか、それとも単に良心の呵責に苛まれ、総督の鋭い視線に過去の記憶を掻き立てられただけなのか、確信が持てない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem'in bakışlarında canını sıkan başka bir şeyler var. Bir serzeniş kırıntısı? Alay? Kınama?.. Bu gerçek mi yoksa {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}vicdanındaki suçluluk duygusu{/d} sana oyun oynayıp geçmişte yaşadıklarını valinin keskin bakışlarında karşıya mı çıkarıyor? Bundan emin olamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem'in bakışlarında canını sıkan başka bir şeyler var. Bir serzeniş kırıntısı? Alaycılık? Kınama? Bunun gerçek mi olduğuna, yoksa yalnızca vicdanındaki suçluluk duygusunun sana bir oyun oynayıp geçmişteki anılarını valinin keskin bakışlarında karşına mı çıkardığına emin olamıyorsun.{/n}

{n}Drivestem'in bakışlarında canını sıkan başka bir şeyler var. Bir serzeniş kırıntısı? Alay? Kınama?.. Bu gerçek mi yoksa vicdanındaki suçluluk duygusu sana oyun oynayıp geçmişte yaşadıklarını valinin keskin bakışlarında karşıya mı çıkarıyor? Bundan emin olamıyorsun.{/n}
